QuestData.Title: Call of the Warmatron
QuestData.Description: Our venerable warmatron, Okrilla, has sent me to the far reaches of the world in search of suitable heroes that would join our cause. Are you interested in strengthening the Horde's grasp over the Eastern Kingdoms? Then take this portal to the Blasted Lands and report to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: Silithus, such a worthless piece of land. It is a wonder that the great cataclysm did not sunder it fully!
